name: Oxford Athletic Club Freaky 5K
description:
Join the Steel City Road Runners Club and run the 3rd Annual Oxford Athletic Club Freaky 5K Halloween Costume Fun Run/Walk or the NEW Wyndham Grand Pittsburgh Downtown Terrifying 10K at North Park.  Afterwards stay for a Freaky Family-Friendly Halloween Party at the North Park Ice Rink.  Awards will be given for the overall male and female winners as well as the fastest male and female runners by age category for each race. Best costume awards will also be presented! 

Runners of all ages are welcome with special rates for families!  Prizes for the top 3 group costumes and top 3 individual costumes will be awarded.  ALL family members must register at the same time.

Register today: http://www.active.com/running/allison-park-pa/oxford-athletic-club-freaky-5k-and-wyndham-grand-pittsburgh-downtown-terrifying-10k-costume-run-2011
